def_cn: 世界性的，国际化的;受各国文化影响的
def_en: A cosmopolitan place or society is full of people from many different countries and cultures.

def_cn: 见过世面的;见识广的;开明的
def_en: Someone who is cosmopolitan has had a lot of contact with people and things from many different countries and as a result is very open to different ideas and ways of doing things.
